CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-04-30 15:31
Subject: Code of Ethics Training, LeadForward Workshop, Weekly internal opportunities, Wellbeing Wednesday, Dr Sulaiman Al Habib Offer
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/59490578d967747477092e6ff1d7c0e71968650286.png> 	
It’s time to complete the annual mandatory Code of Ethics training! 

Staying familiar with our Code of Ethics is essential to how we act and operate as a Group. It serves as a guiding framework for each of us, empowering us to make the right decisions and consistently act with integrity, honesty, and respect—toward one another and the world around us.

This year, discover our new AI section in the Code of Ethics, and learn how to use AI tools ethically across the Group!

 Take 10–15 minutes out of your time to complete the training and make sure to fill out the acknowledgement form in order to obtain and upload your certificate.

 Take 10–15 minutes out of your time to complete the training and make sure to fill out the acknowledgement form in order to obtain and upload your certificate.

Take Me There <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=844&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-7-min.png> 	

LeadForward Steps Into New Perspectives

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=845&user=10620> 	

Our Talent Management Team hosted a workshop for the LeadForward manager cohort. Through a dynamic simulation of a fictional organisation, managers stepped into others’ shoes—gaining perspective, building empathy, and exploring how we navigate multiple "worlds" in a day, sparking honest conversations, collaboration, and a shared drive for a more connected, inclusive workplace.
Read More <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=845&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

WEEKLY INTERNAL OPPORTUNITIES
